subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Oakland added much-needed power to its lineup with the signing of the free agent Jack Cust, who agreed to a one-year, $2.65 million contract to return to the A’s.
snippet: Oakland added much-needed power to its lineup with the signing of the free agent Jack Cust, who agreed to a one-year, $2.65 million contract to return to the A’s.
